title: Marathon Enterprises Inc. Recalls Hot Dog Products Due to Possible Extranous Material Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, July 15, 2017 Marathon Enterprises Inc., a Bronx, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 7,196,084 pounds of hot dog products that may be contaminated with extraneous materials, specifically bone fragments, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The beef...
